name: Northside
description: The Northside Industrial District (NID), or simply Northside, is one of the sub-districts of Watson, located in northern Night City. Northside Industrial District (NID) was once Watson's prosperous factory sub-district. Nowadays its desolate and neglected, its factories are mostly non-functional and abandoned due to odd earthquake damage and a lack of investments by Japanese corporations that originally financed this area. New apartments blocks were built on the edge of the district to hide...
